title: Oak (Farming)

properties.name: description
properties.value: Oak trees can be grown by members with level 15 Farming. Players may plant an acorn into a plant pot with a gardening trowel to get an oak seedling, after using a watering can to water the seedling, players will have to wait until it growns into an oak sapling (seedlings can still grow if banked).

The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:Oak (Farming)
This article is about the Farming trees. For the Woodcutting trees, see Oak. For the player-owned house trees, see Oak tree (Construction).

Oak trees can be grown by members with level 15 Farming. Players may plant an acorn into a plant pot with a gardening trowel to get an oak seedling, after using a watering can to water the seedling, players will have to wait until it growns into an oak sapling (seedlings can still grow if banked).

Oak saplings can then be planted in a tree patch, granting 14 experience, a further 467.3 experience upon reaching full growth. A payment of a full basket of tomatoes can be paid to a nearby Gardener to watchover Oak trees. If buying the acorn and tomatoes on the Grand Exchange, it will cost around 598 per tree, assuming one pays a gardener.

If this tree becomes diseased, using secateurs or magic secateurs on it to prune the diseased leaves will bring it back to a healthy state and will yield leaves.

  3. ^ Only dropped by Diseased version.

'''Oak''' trees can be grown by [[members]] with level 15 [[Farming]]. Players may plant an [[acorn]] into a [[plant pot]] with a [[gardening trowel]] to get an [[oak seedling]], after using a [[watering can]] to water the seedling, players will have to wait until it growns into an [[oak sapling]] (seedlings can still grow if banked).

Oak saplings can then be planted in a [[tree patch]], granting 14 experience, a further 467.3 experience upon reaching full growth. A payment of a [[Tomatoes#(5)|full basket of tomatoes]] can be paid to a nearby [[Group of Advanced Gardeners|Gardener]] to watchover Oak trees. If buying the [[acorn]] and tomatoes on the [[Grand Exchange]], it will cost around {{Coins|{{GEP|Acorn}}+{{GEP|Tomatoes(5)}}}} per tree, assuming one pays a gardener.

If this tree becomes diseased, using [[secateurs]] or [[magic secateurs]] on it to prune the diseased leaves will bring it back to a healthy state and will yield [[Leaves (oak)|leaves]].
